metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2399 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the quicktime_read_pascal function in libquicktime 1.2.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have other unspecified impact via a crafted hdlr MP4 atom.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2399` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libquicktime2 - 2:1.2.4-10
quicktime-utils - 2:1.2.4-10
quicktime-x11utils - 2:1.2.4-10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libquicktime package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.2.4-10').
